suncertify.client

Class LocalClientController

  • java.lang.Object
    • suncertify.client.ClientController
      • suncertify.client.LocalClientController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.rmi.Remote, DBUpdateListener

    public class LocalClientController
extends ClientController
implements DBUpdateListener
    The LocalClientController class is a controller type that uses a local BrokerServer for database operations.
    Since:
    1.0
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Augustine Ogundimu
    See Also:
    ClientController, DBUpdateListener

    • Constructor Detail

      • LocalClientController

        LocalClientController()
               throws BrokerClientException
        The constructor. It obtains a reference to the appropriate BrokerServer object and register for database updates notifications with the server.
        Throws:
        BrokerClientException - If an error is encountered in the process.
